lead_paragraph: Olympique Lyonnais president Jean-Michel Aulas was left fuming after Spanish police allegedly used excessive force when they charged the French club's fans ahead of the team's Champions League game at Sevilla on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Lyon Fuming Over Spanish Police Show of Force
headline.main: Lyon Fuming Over Spanish Police Show of Force
